snippet: The Navy’s sonar and training exercises in the Atlantic and the Pacific would cause damage to millions of marine mammals, including some endangered species.
lead_paragraph: The Navy’s sonar and training exercises in the Atlantic and the Pacific would cause damage to millions of marine mammals, including some endangered species.
